    • Skysail Server Extension DbViewer

Bundles > Skysail Server Extension DbViewer

This server extension provides functionality to manage database connections and to access (view for now) the stored data. As usual, as a server extension, it provides a restful interface, communication via JSON.

URIs of the Resources

Assuming that our application is hosted locally and is listening to port 8554:

URI Description
/dbviewer/connections/ URI of the "connections" resource
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId} URI of the "connection" resource where {connectionId} represents the identifier of a connection
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId}/schemas URI of the "schemas" resource
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId}/schemas/{schema} URI of the "schema" resource
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId}/schemas/{schema}/tables URI of the "tables" resource
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId}/schemas/{schema}/tables/{tablename} URI of the "table" resource
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId}/schemas/{schema}/tables/{tablename}/columns URI of the "columns" resource
/dbviewer/connections/{connectionId}/schemas/{schema}/tables/{tablename}/data URI of the "data" resource

Methods applied on each resource

Resource Http Method Java Description Status
connections GET ConnectionsResource#getConnections() Lists the current connections. done
POST ConnectionsResource#addConnections() Creates a new user according to the data sent in the provided JSON request. done
connection GET ConnectionResource#getConnection() Provides a representation of the connection. done
PUT ConnectionResource#updateConnection() Updates the current connection with a new set of properties. wip
DELETE ConnectionResource#deleteConnection() Deletes the current connection. done
tables GET Lists the tables for the current connection. done
POST Creates a new table according to the data sent in the provided JSON request. done
columns GET Lists the columns for the current table in the current connection. done
data GET Lists the data for the table in the current connection. wip
